I had 2 problems :
- gameinfo.txt missing in /hl2
- then : unable to play a new game

Solutions :

- First, copy "gameinfo.txt" from "/PoRtAl/portal" to "/PorTal/hl2"

If you can launch the game, but you cant play a new game, here's what I did :
- Download from the internet a savegame
(for exemple http://www.nicouzouf.com/en/?id=portal), get the "Start" one.
- Create a folder named "SAVE" in "PoRTaLhl2" and copy the savegame

Finaly load the savegame and ... it works ! (for me at least xD)
